conversations.content: You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Does the University of Technology Nuremberg attend international education fairs?
Yes, UTN participates in fairs worldwide, including upcoming events in Windhoek, Bangkok, Hanoi, and Santiago de Chile.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Hey, will there be any UTN events near me in Thailand?
Yes! UTN will be in Bangkok on 26.04 - 27.04.2025—check it out if you’re nearby.

What’s the International Culture Exchange Week, and where is it held?
It’s a UTN event taking place in Hanoi, Vietnam, from 14.05 - 20.05.2025.

How does UTN handle website data privacy?
Clicking "Accept all" consents to data transfer to DAAD/third parties without EU-level protection. Manage preferences under "Cookies" at the page bottom.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.

Yes, adjust consent anytime under the "Cookies" section at the end of the page.
